title: verify  SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE column updated to CN when cancel the adobe sign
custom_preconds:
Set async.signature.cancel.agreements.enabled property true
A reservation transaction should be completed for a package which is associated to payment plan with Signature Template

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to My tickets with the patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successful

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on "MPV RENEWALS" from the left hand menu Verify that the Renewal Group API is called
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "MPV RENEWALS" renew group page should be displayed and the Get Renewal Group API should be called The renew group page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on "Renew" button Verify that the Get Renewal Orders API is called
custom_steps_separated.expected: The cart page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on Continue to Checkout
custom_steps_separated.expected: All the order details should be correct and the user should be navigated to renewal checkout page

custom_steps_separated.content:
Enter the Payment method
Click "I AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING:"
Click Checkout

verify Adobe Sign pop up displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Adobe Sign pop up should displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click Return to cart
custom_steps_separated.expected: Adobe sign pop up should closed & application should return to checkout page

custom_steps_separated.content:
verify DB
SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE column in signature_agreement table
custom_steps_separated.expected: SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE should display as CN

Set async.signature.cancel.agreements.enabled property true
A reservation transaction should be completed for a package which is associated to payment plan with Signature Template

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to My tickets with the patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successful

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on "MPV RENEWALS" from the left hand menu Verify that the Renewal Group API is called
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "MPV RENEWALS" renew group page should be displayed and the Get Renewal Group API should be called The renew group page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.expected: The cart page should be displayed

wait 30 minutes until the MPV cart get expired

title: verify  SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE column updated to SN after adobe sign checkout  where Consume Credit During Online Renewal "Pre Apply" & payment plan enabled "Require Signature Even if Order Paid in Full"
custom_preconds:
Set async.signature.cancel.agreements.enabled property true
Create a package
Create a renewal group with  "Pre Apply" 
Create a payment plan enabled "Require Signature Even if Order Paid in Full"
A reservation transaction for above package

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to My tickets with the patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successful

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on "MPV RENEWALS" from the left hand menu Verify that the Renewal Group API is called
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "MPV RENEWALS" renew group page should be displayed and the Get Renewal Group API should be called The renew group page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on "Renew" button Verify that the Get Renewal Orders API is called
custom_steps_separated.expected: The cart page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on Continue to Checkout
custom_steps_separated.expected: All the order details should be correct and the user should be navigated to renewal checkout page

custom_steps_separated.content:
Enter the Payment method
Click "I AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING:"
Click Checkout

verify Adobe Sign pop up displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Adobe Sign pop up should displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
Click continue to Adobe sign 
-sign the document & click "Click to Sign"
custom_steps_separated.expected: checkout should be successful and the confirmation page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
verify DB
SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE column in signature_agreement table
custom_steps_separated.expected: SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE should display as SN for above order

title: verify  SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE column updated to CN when adobe sign got expired without sign (Multiple Order)
custom_preconds:
Set async.signature.cancel.agreements.enabled property true
Complete multiple reservation transaction for a package which is associated to payment plan with Signature Template

custom_steps_separated.content: Login to My tickets with the patron
custom_steps_separated.expected: Login should be successful

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on "MPV RENEWALS" from the left hand menu Verify that the Renewal Group API is called
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "MPV RENEWALS" renew group page should be displayed and the Get Renewal Group API should be called The renew group page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on "Renew" button Verify that the Get Renewal Orders API is called
custom_steps_separated.expected: The cart page should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on Continue to Checkout
custom_steps_separated.expected: All the order details should be correct and the user should be navigated to renewal checkout page

custom_steps_separated.content:
Enter the Payment method
Click "I AGREE TO THE FOLLOWING:"
Click Checkout

verify Adobe Sign pop up displayed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Adobe Sign pop up should displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
Click continue to Adobe sign
-sign the document & click "Click to Sign"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Order1 document should get signed

custom_steps_separated.content:
Order2 document should get displayed

wait 30 minutes until the MPV cart get expired

Note:Dont sign the doc
custom_steps_separated.expected: MPV cart should get expired

custom_steps_separated.content:
verify DB
SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE column in signature_agreement table
custom_steps_separated.expected: SIG_AGMT_STS_TYPE_CODE should display as CN for the above order
